SalesAgreementProdSchdAdj.name: SalesAgreementProdSchdAdj
SalesAgreementProdSchdAdj.description: Represents the manual adjustments made to metric values for a sales agreement product schedule.

Adjusted By.description: The ID of the user whoâ€™s made an adjustment to the sales agreement product schedule record.

Sales Agreement Product Schedule.description: The sales agreement product schedule record to which an adjustment was made.

Advanced Account Forecast Measure Defini.description: The measure definition of the advanced account forecast record to which the adjustment is being made.

Initial Value.description: The value in the sales agreement product schedule record before the adjustment is made.

Updated Value Status.description: The status of the adjustment made to a sales agreement product schedule.

Comment.description: Additional information provided by the user who made the adjustments.
